text: Ami abasya'i taderake pathabhrasta karaba; abasya'i tadera hrdaye mithya basanara srsti karaba, ara abasya'i ami taderake nirdesa deba, phale tara pasura kana chidra karabe. Ara abasya'i taderake nirdesa deba, phale tara allahara srsti bikrta karabeâ€™ [1].â€™ Ara allahara paribarte ke'u sayatanake abhibhabakarupe grahana karale se spastatahi ksatigrasta haya
